function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mass surveillance from COVID-19 apps","Impact":"Violation of civil liberties, privacy concerns, potential discrimination and marginalization","Mitigation":"Ensuring lawful, necessary, and proportionate surveillance, protecting data security and anonymity, addressing the risk of exacerbating discrimination and marginalization","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization techniques, digital governance tools","People":"General public, marginalized groups","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Device competence limitations in underdeveloped nations","Impact":"Limited access to contact tracing and monitoring, unequal distribution of resources, digital divide","Mitigation":"Developing applications for a range of devices, providing access to low-cost devices, improving network infrastructure","Technologies":"Low-resource application development, network infrastructure improvement","People":"Underdeveloped nations, marginalized communities","Owner":"Technology developers, international aid organizations"}]}
